comment: A good girl.  Jiski naak pe hamesha gussa rehta hai. Jab bhi baat karti hai depression de jati hai.  Par achi ladki hai, and a good frend of mine. 😁😁
name: Md Sahid Ahmed

comment: I wish Sanju all the best for her future endeavors. With her academic prowess, she's sure to achieve great things. Here's to a bright and successful future ahead, Sanju!
name: Deepak Sain

comment:
Hamesha ek hi baat bolti hai ~ jyada nahi bol raha tu😂
# Sanju Khatarnaak Nehra.
Wish you all the best.
name: Sunny Kumar Keshri
